title: WTB/Low grade off Conditon T cards
author: Johnny630

posts.post_title: WTB/Low grade off Conditon T cards
posts.post_content:
Good Morning,

I’m looking for a fellow long time collector friend of mine on a budget. Looking to spend 30-50$.

He is Looking for t cards baseball or non sport in poor/fair good condition. 

Minor paper loss is fine. Please no holes or markings or missing pieces.

Please pm if you have a small group you wouldn’t mind parting with. 

Thank You 
Johnny
